name: Space
description: Spatial extent above the Atmosphere around Earth

name: Atmosphere
description: Spatial extent from the Earth surface towards but excluding space

name: Marine
description: Continuous saline, non-cryosphere part of the hydrosphere

name: Terrestrial
description: Spatial extent comprised of land masses, normally not covered by the Ocean or other water bodies and excluding cryosphere

name: Cryosphere
description: Spatial extent of the Earth's surface characterized by the presence of frozen water, including glaciers, ice sheets, snow and permafrost

name: Hydrological
description: Non-saline, non-atmosphere, non-cryosphere part of the hydrosphere, including lakes, rivers, groundwater

name: Solid Earth
description: Spatial extent of the Earth from the solid surface inwards
